Linda Rising - Queen of Patterns. Author of numerous Books

ABSTRACT
Just like a married couple who has been together for a long time, agile teams can grow a little careless in doing retrospectives. Some of the rationale for the practice might have slipped away or the insights might seem less compelling or, in [...]
